attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I was minding my own business and I got this app because I just lOvE donald trump and while I was scrolling through it, I got a tErRibLe virus causing my whole camera role to be filled with pictures of Cheeto man, and all my ringtones changed to the national anthem. DO NOT GET THIS APP I already made the mistake so you don’t have too‼️‼️✨🧚‍♀️ ps. If you’re taking our app, so are we❤️

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and almost immediately after my high school bully came knocking at my door and decided to beat me up. The day after I got kicked out of my house and was forced to befriend the rats on the streets. A week later I died. All I’m saying is that this app brings bad voodoo magic to whomever downloads it. Would not recommend 🙁

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Shortly after I downloaded this app all my contacts and photos were wiped off of my phone I then had to go to at&t to get it fixed to only be told that whatever happend yo my phone cannot be replaced this app is bad news make sure your phone is backed up before you even try downloading🙂🙃

attributes.title: awful absolutely awful
attributes.review: this app gave me immediate trauma when i opened it. i had to go to the hospital bc it scared me so bad. now every time i think of it i get ptsd which leads to explosive vomiting and diarrhea. i wouldnt recommend this app to ANYBODY in the whole world. tiktok is the only thing that will help me stop projectile vomiting when i think about 😤donald 🤮 trumps😖 awful👹 app👿.

attributes.title: UNACCEPTABLE!!!!
attributes.review: I had very high💕 expectations💅🏽 for this app, but upon opening it I was informed that I was required to wear a mask to use it!😤🤬😡😠this is a violation of my constitutional📜 rights!! Not to mention my medical😷 condition🤒 (✨e n t i t l e m e n t✨) would prevent me from doing so🤧. There were ZERO managers👜 to speak with, leaving my very important problem unresolved🌪!! You’ve just lost a VERY valuable voter🇺🇸😠😤

attributes.title: THe worst🤡🧚🏽
attributes.review: Right when I downloaded the app my phone shut down and I couldn’t get on it for weeks! Not just that but when I finally got back in my phone all my apps were deleted! I really thought this would be a great app... I thought it would be epic where it was like Instagram but really it’s just a failure, DO NOT RECOMMEND

Take this app down I’m so mad rn I look in my phone and go to my photos and there nothing at all I’m so mad all those photos are my memories and u took that away.I WANT MY DOG BACK. You took my dog and they left a not saying if u don’t vote for trump you’ll never see your dog again and that’s hard bc I don’t want to vote for him he took my photos and my dog #justicefordoggy

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: I am a fellow republican trump supporter and I just have to say I am so ashamed that the trump administration has the AUDACITY to post such inappropriate topics on this app. This app should be rated 17+ because of how many times I saw Mr. Trumps tiny penis. Did I mention this app spams your phone with THOUSANDS of text messages and it to mention It took FOREVER to download and when I say forever I mean it took 84 years.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I have received a virus from this app, literally can’t get it off my phone now. I don’t understand what software their using but it’s disgusting. There’s these weird photos popping up on my phone and there’s just pictures of Oompa-Loompas all over. They keep yelling “MAGA” at me idk even know what that means but. Again like I said don’t download. Please. :)
